text: aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki usakee or aao, jo allaah ne utaara hai tatha rasool kee or (aao), to kahate hain, hamen vahee bas hai, jisapar hamane apane poorvajon ko paaya hai, kya unake poorvaj kuchh na jaanate rahe hon aur na sammaarg par rahe hon (tab bhee ve unheen ke raaste par chalenge)
